languages.text: {n}Изуродованные губы Нихель кривятся, а в голосе расцветает испуг.{/n} "Я не просто так заманила тебя сюда, Паскаль. Я хотела, чтобы ты увидел, во что выродились наши последователи — вот до чего доводит отступление от догмы! Нарушенный канон рождает неведение, неведение — богохульство!"

{n}Nihel's disfigured lips twist, and seeds of dismay sprout in her voice:{/n} "I lured you here for a reason, Pasqal. I wanted you to see what our followers had become. This is what deviation from dogma ends in! Breach of canon begets ignorance. Ignorance begets blasphemy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Изуродованные губы Нихель кривятся, а в голосе расцветает испуг.{/n} "Я не просто так заманила тебя сюда, Паскаль. Я хотела, чтобы ты увидел, во что выродились наши последователи — вот до чего доводит отступление от догмы! Нарушенный канон рождает неведение, неведение — богохульство!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel's disfigured lips twist, and seeds of dismay sprout in her voice.{/n} "I lured you here for a reason, Pasqal. I wanted you to see what our followers had degenerated into. This is what deviation from dogma ends in! Breach of canon begets ignorance. Ignorance begets blasphemy!"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}傷跡の残るニヘルの唇がゆがみ、落胆の種が声に乗って吐き出される。{/n}「訳あってここにおびき出したのだ、パスカル。私たちの仲間がどうなったかを見せたかった。教義を逸脱した結果がこれだ！聖典に反した行いが無知を生じ、無知は冒涜を生む！」
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's disfigured lips twist, and seeds of dismay sprout in her voice:{/n} "I lured you here for a reason, Pasqal. I wanted you to see what our followers had become. This is what deviation from dogma ends in! Breach of canon begets ignorance. Ignorance begets blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}傷跡の残るニヘルの唇がゆがみ、落胆の種が声に乗って吐き出される。{/n}「訳あってここにおびき出したのだ、パスカル。私たちの仲間がどうなったかを見せたかった。教義を逸脱した結果がこれだ！聖典に反した行いが無知を生じ、無知は冒涜を生む！」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}妮赫尔变形的嘴唇扭曲了，声音中透露出一丝沮丧。{/n}“我把你引到这里是有原因的，帕斯卡。我想让你看看，我们的追随者都变成了什么样子。这就是偏离教条的结果！违背圣典的行为会招致愚昧，而愚昧会招致亵渎！”
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's disfigured lips twist, and seeds of dismay sprout in her voice:{/n} "I lured you here for a reason, Pasqal. I wanted you to see what our followers had become. This is what deviation from dogma ends in! Breach of canon begets ignorance. Ignorance begets blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}雅珀变形的嘴唇扭曲了，声音中透露出一丝沮丧。{/n}“我把你引到这里是有原因的，帕斯卡。我想让你看看，我们的追随者都变成了什么样子。这就是偏离教条的结果！违背圣典的行为会招致愚昧，而愚昧会招致亵渎！”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihel tord les lèvres, une note de désarroi dans la voix.{/n} « Je ne vous ai pas attiré ici sans raison, Pasqal. Je voulais voir ce qu'il était advenu de nos fidèles. Mais voilà ce qu'il advient lorsque l'on dévie du dogme ! Transgresser les préceptes ne peut qu'engendrer l'ignorance. Et l'ignorance engendre le blasphème ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's disfigured lips twist, and seeds of dismay sprout in her voice:{/n} "I lured you here for a reason, Pasqal. I wanted you to see what our followers had become. This is what deviation from dogma ends in! Breach of canon begets ignorance. Ignorance begets blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel tord les lèvres, une note de désarroi dans la voix.{/n} « Je ne vous ai pas attiré ici sans raison, Pasqal. Je voulais voir ce qu'il était advenu de nos fidèles. Mais voilà ce qu'il advient lorsque l'on dévie du dogme ! Transgresser les préceptes ne peut qu'engendrer l'ignorance. Et l'ignorance engendre le blasphème ! »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Los labios desfigurados de Nihel se tuercen y su voz muestra cierta consternación.{/n} «Te atraje aquí por algo, Pasqal. Quería que vieras en lo que se han convertido nuestros seguidores. ¡Esto es lo que pasa al desviarse del dogma! ¡Salirse del canon produce ignorancia y la ignorancia da lugar a la blasfemia!».
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's disfigured lips twist, and seeds of dismay sprout in her voice:{/n} "I lured you here for a reason, Pasqal. I wanted you to see what our followers had become. This is what deviation from dogma ends in! Breach of canon begets ignorance. Ignorance begets blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios desfigurados de Nihel se tuercen y su voz muestra cierta consternación.{/n} «Te atraje aquí por algo, Pasqal. Quería que vieras en lo que se han convertido nuestros seguidores. ¡Esto es lo que pasa al desviarse del dogma! ¡Salirse del canon produce ignorancia y la ignorancia da lugar a la blasfemia!».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihels entstellte Lippen verziehen sich, und die Saat der Bestürzung sprießt in ihrer Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe Euch aus einem bestimmten Grund hergelockt, Pasqal. Ihr solltet sehen, was aus unseren Anhängern geworden ist. Dazu führt die Abweichung vom Dogma! Ein Bruch mit dem Kanon führt zu Ignoranz. Ignoranz führt zu Blasphemie!"
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's disfigured lips twist, and seeds of dismay sprout in her voice:{/n} "I lured you here for a reason, Pasqal. I wanted you to see what our followers had become. This is what deviation from dogma ends in! Breach of canon begets ignorance. Ignorance begets blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihels entstellte Lippen verziehen sich, und die Saat der Bestürzung sprießt in ihrer Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe Euch aus einem bestimmten Grund hergelockt, Pasqal. Ihr solltet sehen, was aus unseren Anhängern geworden ist. Dazu führt die Abweichung vom Dogma! Ein Bruch mit dem Kanon führt zu Ignoranz. Ignoranz führt zu Blasphemie!"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: {n}Nihel'in biçimsiz dudakları kıvrılıyor, sesinde keder kırıntıları peyda oluyor.{/n} "Seni belli bir sebeple buraya getirdim Pasqal. Takipçilerimizin ne hâle geldiğini görmeni istedim. Dogmadan ayrılmanın sonucu bu işte! Nizamnameyi yok saymak cehalete, cehalet de dine aykırılığa yol açar."
languages.original_text: {n}Nihel's disfigured lips twist, and seeds of dismay sprout in her voice:{/n} "I lured you here for a reason, Pasqal. I wanted you to see what our followers had become. This is what deviation from dogma ends in! Breach of canon begets ignorance. Ignorance begets blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nihel'in biçimsiz dudakları kıvrılıyor ve sesinde keder kırıntıları peyda oluyor:{/n} "Seni belli bir sebepten buraya getirdim Pasqal. Takipçilerimizin ne hâle geldiğini görmeni istedim. Dogmadan ayrılmanın sonucu bu işte! Nizamı yok saymak cehalete, cehalet de günahkârlığa yol açar."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
